column4: There are reports of high water conditions in various areas of Lexington.
Please DO NOT drive through areas of high water.

column5: All lanes shutdown.  Traffic diverted to the left emergency lane.

column4: Todds Rd near Todds Station Rd
column5: Downed tree partially in the roadway.

column4: The NWS has issued a tornado watch effective until May 18 at 9:00 p.m. for various counties to include Fayette Co.
The NWS has issued a flash flood warning for Fayette Co effective until May 18 at 6:30 p.m.
